website_summaries.verdict: The lace-up back and supportive materials are geared to those who are familiar with waist-cinchers, but it may be too complicated if it's your first time wearing this type of garment.
pros: Features bones and steel bars for serious waist training plus back support
The lace-up back is easy to adjust, and its slim design isn't generally noticeable under clothes
cons: Those who are new to waist training may find the heavy-duty materials uncomfortable
Some size discrepancies have been reported (some say too small, others too large)

customer_reviews.title: NOT A STEEL BONED CORSET
customer_reviews.text: This is not a steel boned corset. It is plastic boned. This is a fashion corset. May work for a Halloween costume, that's about it. Didn't even open this fully to try it on-description/name is not accurate. Don't waste your time or money if you are looking for a real steel boned corset. Change the name of this item to reflect what this item actually is!
customer_reviews.author: NYCDapp

customer_reviews.title: Lost an inch in a week!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Outstanding quality for a steel of a price! I got a size smaller and so glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Camomoma

customer_reviews.title: A short lived miracle
customer_reviews.text: I have loved every minute of wearing this. After not recognizing postpartum abdominal separation for a year, I tried other Velcro and hook+eye binders. They each curled over or rode up. But this corset fit snugly, broke in quickly, helped me sit up straighter, and supported me when I lifted the baby or weights. It doesn't dig into my hips when I sit, or my ribs. After months of physical therapy, suddenly I'm making incredible progress closing the gap in my muscles. Sadly, after 22 days of intermittent wearing, the ribbons inside are shredding and the mesh is tearing. If I could get just a little more use for the money I spent, it would be 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my waist trainer and I immediately had to put it on. Not only did I immediately feel skinnier and curvier, when I sit down I can feel my posture improving. It's really incredible. I highly recommend the product. It is true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Self esteem boost!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Just wow! As embarrassing as it is, I wanted to show people before putting this godsend on and after. I’m 4months post part I’m and this made me feel sexy again. It does the trick that’s for sure. Only thing is that it’s not too comfortable and it’s a bit hard to put on by yourself. (To be expected)
customer_reviews.author: Emilee

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.text: This corset is not for long torso. I dont even have long torso, but it gave me lower stomach pooch, especially when sitting down. The quality is ok. The lace is too short, the corset is too big. I ordered 4" smaller then my natural waist, when I should have ordered at least 8. I wore this corset for a couple of days before I decided that the pooch is unacceptable. So I went ahead and ordered one from different company and the fit is amazing. Covers up my lower abdomen, no pooch, double laced, and the quality is unbelievably solid. So, I just wasted money on something that been used only a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: Stranger

customer_reviews.title: Amazing costume piece!
customer_reviews.text: I am an opera singer and have been tired of costume designers putting me in lumpy, ill-fitting and non-flattering corsets, so I decided to buy my own. I couldn't be happier! I just finished up a gig, and I looked sexy and thin. I'm 5'8", wear a size 8/10 dress and have a long torso. I bought a size large and it fit well. I hate wearing tight clothing, but this corset didn't bother me because it doesn't go down onto my belly - it ends about 2 inches above my belly button. It's also more flattering because it doesn't cover the belly.
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: Too Short, Too Difficult
customer_reviews.text: I am a very diligent shopper and so I am always sure to buy the right size based on my measurements. I have not been unhappy with the way a product fits until now. I am 5'3 and if this was too short for ME ... I'm not sure who this was made for. It is very supportive once you get it on but there is no way you could wear this every day, the bottom and the top flare way out and that is with everything tighten appropriately. I'm not sure How they could improve this product except to maybe testing it on a few women.
customer_reviews.author: MarynAra Sauce

customer_reviews.title: Lots of compliments for this postpartum belly.
customer_reviews.text: This corset is lined with steel so the chances of it buckling are close to none. This corset is designed to sit snuggly under your breasts for a cohesive look. The corset has a nice flap in the back to protect skin and accommodate different waist sizes. My only suggestion is to wear a camisole under need to prevent pinching on your belly when you are working with the magnetic metal clasp. Wearing this I have got lots of compliments. It does help with posture and slimming waist. I am a postpartum mommy with about 40lbs of excess weight and an apple shape.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Tmmygunz

customer_reviews.title: Sizing isn’t quite right.
customer_reviews.text: If it were sized as listed I’d be a lot more pleased. I ordered a medium/sz 26. It measures 28 inch. So I don’t know if it was mislabeled or what. I have a 31 inch natural waist and am comfortably 2 inches from closing on day 2 of seasoning. If you are looking for a really curvy corset, this one is not it. It is slightly curvy. Seems to be made well - super sturdy. It adjusts really easily. I’d say for the price, it’s a good deal. We will see how she holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Lorb

customer_reviews.title: Don’t even bother.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this same corset when it was still “carmellas” and it lasted over a year. I ordered this now and I could tell right when I got it that the quality had gone down significantly. This is terrible. I never even got to actually put it on. The middle tooth broke immediately. It feels so cheap compared to the one I paid less for with a different name on the tag.
customer_reviews.author: Luna Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and quality
customer_reviews.text: I am a 18/20 size waist and this fit well. I loved the adjustability. The laces are normal cotton laces so if you went a more sophisticated look, I’d suggest buying some other laces or ribbon. I wore this for a Renaissance festival over a dress and it was perfect! Great quality and the boning is exceptional for the price. I have tried other inexpensive corsets and the boning would stab me and collapse. These held up to sitting and moving. I have a relatively long torso and this still hit below the belly button for me. Would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: nice small waist
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to corsets and this one is my second. I'm 5'4", about 125 lbs and very little natural curve. The first one I love but it's too big, so I bought another. This corset has a lovely, tiny waist that I adore. However, the reinforcing at the bottom is WAY too small for the body of the corset. It causes a big groove all the way around the bottom. Stealthing would be impossible, also, it's right on my hip bones so it's causing some minor bruising. I will continue to wear it for training, but will wear the "old" one out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect perfect perfect, exelent exelent exelent
customer_reviews.text: I dont know what to say..... it’s Perfect exelent it fit like a dream lowered my waist a lot now i can close it more that before I sujest getting a one smaller size than you’re own I’m happy its tight it keeps my pained back straight and my tummy tucked the first few days were hard getting used to it but it started loosening up and i started tightening it more and more perfect just perfect I’ll definitely will be trying now a whole corset chest and waist to see how it feels
customer_reviews.author: yaima

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it!
customer_reviews.text: This item is so poorly made, I am returning it immediately! The front busk fell off when I tried it on for the first time. The fabric is cheap and yucky feeling. It is advertised as "steel boned". NOT! I am a very experienced wearer of corsets. No way this item is worth your time or money.
customer_reviews.author: cheree

customer_reviews.title: I am in love! This was a temporary buy until I have ...
customer_reviews.text: I am in love! This was a temporary buy until I have the money to get one from Alter Ego Clothing. It showed a tremendous difference within the first day and I am currently seasoning in it!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Hamer

customer_reviews.title: Low price point, impeccable quality.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to cosplay Midnight from My Hero Academia. Sizing: perfect. Just look for your natural waist measurement in parenthesis when you go to select your size. Don't worry about what you're trying to corset down to. Context: I'm a seamstress of over 10 years, I've made several steel boned corsets of my own, I know my stuff. This is insanely high quality for what you're paying. The materials are genuine and sturdy and the craftsmanship is wonderful. A+ purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Berry

customer_reviews.title: Good quality ledgit corset
customer_reviews.text: One of the stays on the front broke pretty quick... happened to a corset we had before and may have been our fault bought another and will fix the other but don’t want to engage a return cause it really may be our fault, stays are what they are. Other than that this thing is 100% ledgit and worth the price vs anything else of the same quality that would run about $30 more
customer_reviews.author: Von Dorken

customer_reviews.title: Really lovely, sturdy, beginner corset
customer_reviews.text: This corset was purchased as an introductory to waist training. I find it just the right amount of sturdy and flexible to wear for long periods without immense discomfort. It also looks really beautiful. The corset came laced appropriately and it was easy to try on for the first time. If your looking for a lovely black corset, that won't break the bank and is quality material this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Thorasaurus Rex

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, but there is a few things you should know...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality, but very heavy! I had to return mine because I think I received the wrong item or either mine was defective. The one I got did not have the same dip in the front as they show in the picture, so it didn't cover my whole abdomen like I thought it would. You should also be advised that this corset has no give, so measure your waist and make sure you buy the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: KRISTY

customer_reviews.title: A high quality corset for a substanially lower price
customer_reviews.text: I've had many corsets over the years. Few of them would I ever buy again. This particular corset I'll buy three of just to make sure I always have a spare. Follow the sizing guidelines for wearing corsets and you'll be fine. This particular seller also shipped my product super quick and had it to me in less than three days using standard shipping. Great product and service means I highly recommend that more people buy their corsets. UPDATE - I've purchased the size small in brown as the medium was no longer able to go any tighter for me. Still the same great product as before and I'll recommend this product to anyone looking for training corsets.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany St Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality - uses the best hardware
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the corset and I expect to be buying another one soon. I've made one before so I know what to look for. One thing that really pleased me was the length of the strings. I am able to tie the strings in the front without a problem. I bought this to wear all day everyday as a diet aid, basically to make my stomach feel full on less. So far, it seems to be working, and therefore I foresee needing a size down in the near future. Note, I like the corset to be close to closing so that would make the string excess be longer for me.
customer_reviews.author: susan22818

customer_reviews.title: Great corset, ESPECIALLY for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 6-8, and I ordered a small. It was perfect--remember the corset is supposed to be tight! there's a modesty panel in the back so your skin won't show, and it really doesn't take long to be able to reduce the gap! Great corset, ESPECIALLY for the price! If you're going for your first one, DO THIS ONE! But make sure you also look up how to season a corset, so that you don't end up accidentally ruining it or hurting yourself :)
customer_reviews.author: Jekajamstar

customer_reviews.title: Follow the sizing chart
customer_reviews.text: Ladies order your shirt size! I tried to cut corners and squeeze into a large (my actual shirt size is xl) and it’s a no go! Now I actually have to lose weight to fit into the corset lol which isn’t necessarily a bad thing. But I’m 5’7 208lbs and should’ve ordered a xl but it’s very beautiful and well crafted, can’t wait to slip into it!
customer_reviews.author: Ebony K.

customer_reviews.title: True to size, but not recommended for larger busts.
customer_reviews.text: Only the front part was steel boned so I might have overlooked the details on this one. It was super cute, but beware it can only do so much for those with larger busts. No darts means that it doesn’t fit “snugly” to your curves. I ordered a bit too large (online shopping experiences have always recommend that!) so it didn’t fit me. I couldn’t get it to tighten to my waist because of this, but it was still great material and super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Fumiiko

customer_reviews.title: Im 5'7. 180 lbs. Waist 32.5 inches curvy/athletic
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow I'm synched to the max ! Im 5'7. 180 lbs. Curvy/athletic. My waist is a 32.5 inches normal. I bought a medium. With it tight my waste is a 30 inches. Measured at my belly button. Perfect fit. Plenty of room to loosen or synch tighter for a smaller waist. I wear mine 2 hrs before bed and 2-3 hrs during sleep for 4-5 consecutive hrs. Thanks to the questions and answers section, I was able to figure out what size to get to fit me!!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Corset but don’t expect to breathe easy ;)
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this corset. It’s a nicely made one. Once on and laced in...don’t expect to breathe. It’s a real corset after all. If you’re looking for a small waist with a pretty piece that can be worn over or under clothes this is the way to go. It does run small so size up. I found...Your waist measurement might be right but your ribs will not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amber M.

customer_reviews.title: The smooth satin like finish did not show under clothes
customer_reviews.text: I am 5"5' and a size medium but wanted to shrink down to a small. The smooth satin like finish did not show under clothes, which was great. It also really CINCHES the waistline courtesy of their steel-boned underwire. However, after wearing it a few months one of the button receiving knobs broke off...kinda cheap. To make things worse, the material at the bottom point started coming off revealing the cardboard skeleton under the material. It does the job but a little disappointing if you want to wear it for more than a few months.
customer_reviews.author: ILuv2Shop

customer_reviews.title: I'm feeling like "Aha! So that's how all those regular people ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a serious corset here. Heavy steel bones, strong laces, etc. I bought one size smaller than suggested by the sizing chart, just to have somewhere to go if I really wanted to cinch a lot (have 31" waist, and ordered the Medium) It just totally hourglasses your figure... I'm feeling like "Aha! So that's how all those regular people end up looking like Comic book characters -- they've been cheating :-) Get one of these, and you too can look like you were just "drawn that way" Lol. I can't imagine putting it on without a helper, but i think it is possible, with some practice. It's also not too bulky to wear under an average fit T-shirt...
customer_reviews.author: ellbee

customer_reviews.title: It's An excellent real Corset
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research and decided to go for this one. It's An excellent real Corset, absolutely worth the money, the quality is perfect and shape the body as an hourglass! If you are looking for a short corset this is the one. I personally like the long ones cos tight the lower part of the belly much better. This corset is very nice, strong and comfortable. Try thigh it gradually so you can get used to it. I'll say follow the size chart it fitted good and can get smaller as I loose weight ! (I got medium I'm 29 inches normal 😝)
customer_reviews.author: Faisal Lodhi

customer_reviews.title: A TRUE Corset
customer_reviews.text: THIS is a TRUE corset with durable, fixed steel boning and heavy duty, thick lacing. Bought a medium for me (27" waist, 38" hips) and a large for sister (30" waist, 41" hips). Perfect fit! I wish it came in every color!
customer_reviews.author: Siren

customer_reviews.title: Best one for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I will definitely buy this again if I need to get a smaller size eventually. The look I achieve with this is amazing!!! I need to wear it more routinely but I try to do it at least a couple times a week. Even when you take it off you can see the shape. I have started to noticed slight differences after a month of intermittent usage. I am going to try to be more strict with making sure I'm putting it on and will come back with before and afters.
customer_reviews.author: Ayzia

customer_reviews.title: Missed the mark for me
customer_reviews.text: I returned this product after I did some research on how a good corset should fit. Proper sizing of a corset depends on more than just the waist measurement. This one did not bring the waist line in as much as it should while squeezing too much on the lower rib cage and the upper hips. The point of a corset is to get more of an hourglass shape than what this one provides. The quality of the material and workmanship seemed very well done otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: MythT

customer_reviews.title: Super Quality for Price
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a much more expensive corset before this one, and used this one more regularly. The product came in proper size and was packaged discreetly. The bones are rigid but not painful. The corset overall gave me a great hourglass shape. After a few hours, I need to remove the shapewear because it can be annoying, especially when sitting for long periods. Great purchase and Camillias has amazing other corsets on their page.
customer_reviews.author: Stardust

customer_reviews.title: This corset has good quality in the fabric
customer_reviews.text: This corset has good quality in the fabric, and finishes, It is not very strong like was suppost to be for waist trainig. It is made in China. The laces on the back is cheap, i don't think it will last longer. Fits just fine but for waist training is not very strong. I am 5.2 154pounds M fit me just fine .For is just start to do waist training this one will be good start. I will put pictures when I am wearing it ..
customer_reviews.author: Rose S.

customer_reviews.title: Flatlaces
customer_reviews.text: The corset itself is fine. It looks good and fits just like my other shaperx corset, what I DON’T like however is that, unlike my other corset, this one came with flat laces that make it a nightmare to get off and on. Given that this is a corset for performing, that really sucks and now I have to buy expensive replacement laces.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: No stretch in Fabric but not bad
customer_reviews.text: Not the easiest to get on. There is no stretch in the fabric. The metal hooks were harder to close but this item is probably more like the authentic, old fashioned ones of yester-year! Cant wear under anything so its good for at home... unless you can somehow incorporate it into a Halloween costume!
customer_reviews.author: OnlineShopper

customer_reviews.title: Boning malfunction??
customer_reviews.text: (I have ordered this before in a size large but exchanged for a medium) I don’t know if this is just a malfunction with mine or if this is how this size is (M), but the boning doesn’t go down all the way at all. I’ve noticed the mesh ones don’t appear to be as fluid-looking as the other options. When it’s one there is an obvious bulge from where the boning is missing. My previous one wasn’t super fluid-looking but wasn’t nearly as bad as this one. I will try one more time and exchange for one of the other options and I hope it is better. Pretty upset because I was looking forward to wearing this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made great quality ppl suggested buying a medium I did not ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made great quality ppl suggested buying a medium I did not I got a small and it fits well, I wanted it to be able to adjust as I lost the weight... my sizes are busy 40(34ddd) waist 30 and hops 40” I’m 5’1” 145 lbs and I ordered the small
customer_reviews.author: Katie A

customer_reviews.title: The corset is not quite small enough
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'5", ~130 lbs, and have a 25.5" waist. I was able to tighten this corset a the way in the back with it still being comfortable enough to wear it for 6.5 hours on the 2nd day. I'm gonna have to get a size smaller to continue waist training. If you are my size or smaller, you may want to consider a different size.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Marvel

customer_reviews.title: Good for straight bodies, not for hourglass figures
customer_reviews.text: Well made, however this has a very small rib and hip spring measurement. It’s definitely made for straight bodied people, not someone with a natural hourglass shape. It’s well made, good quality boning, breathable material, but it’s made my natural curves less defined and cuts into my hip.
customer_reviews.author: Rory

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 1 size over what they recommend and I am glad that I did. The fit is a bit more snug than others in the same size that I bought (36) but is still really comfortable. The construction is really nice and comfortable over all. It doesn't ride into my bra like alot of other underbusts do, even when not full tightened. This corset definately isn't designed to be worn fully laced all the time, as I could see how the front eyes would give way. Although the construction seems to be solid it is best to fully work in a corset before trying things like that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how sturdy and well made this corset is for the price. I originally bought the 2x which was too small, but returned it and got a 3x instead which is better for my 38” waist. The seller was super fast and refunded the original, sent the new one out and I got it right away. I’m very pleased with my transaction and the corset is perfect for getting the most flattering look in my wedding dress!
customer_reviews.author: she-she

customer_reviews.title: Not a good corset for me personally
customer_reviews.text: This corset feels well made and heavy it just happened to not be the right one for my body shape. I had massive gaps around my underbust and no room at all for my hips so I was unable to get the waist to cinch properly without lacing incorrectly. This corset is better for less curvy bodies. ended up getting a different one from orchard corset to accommodate my hips.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this. The quality was excellent
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this. The quality was excellent. The stays strong and the ties super strong. I'm a big woman (42-37-40) and this cinched me down to a 34 with no troubles with still a good inch gap. The material is high quality and the stitching is strong. I purposely waited several months before leaving a review because I wanted to hear how it would hold up. I've worn it at least once a week and on multiple occasions a week straight and it has held up excellently with no wear showing. I dry clean mine. I'd be interested to hear how others keep theirs clean. Can't wait to buy another!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: When I tied it all the fat around my waist headed south and pooched out hilariously funny looking. It was really really bad
customer_reviews.text: If you have a belly these won't work! When I tied it all the fat around my waist headed south and pooched out hilariously funny looking. It was really really bad. 100 times worse than muffin top. Like I had a tumor or growth. I did like how it made me stand up straight however my belly fat all went south and was resting just above where my thighs meet my torso. You have to be thin or no belly below your waist for this to work. This should be mentioned in description. I returned it no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jennell Jones

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful - but made with LATEX!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it has great reviews, and the product description did not list any latex, which is a must as I am allergic! I opened it, I thought it smelled like rubber, to I looked at the tag which does not say latex, HOWEVER, the plastic bag the corset comes in says "WARNING made with NATURAL LATEX, MAY CAUSE ALLERGIC REACTIONS" ...So yeah, I have to return it, unfortunately. I will say that the corset was beautiful and sturdy when I opened it! I purchased the one which was satin.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: 5’9, 35 inch waist, 47 1/2 inch hip, 34D.
customer_reviews.text: I love this trainer. I got an XL and I love the fit, but I should have gotten a large. I can already close it all the way, which is fine because it can be tightened more. I’m gonna keep it, but I know I’ll need to size down soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great material
customer_reviews.text: Fits good,is a little hard to clasp it together though sometimes. Love I can pull the strings to make tighter.need to break it in.i love it but my torso may be just a little shorter..lol...my chest gets pushed to high up....so I try to wiggle it down some. It can be a little confusing on which is top and bottom.the part with the tag goes on top.thank you! Hope this helps to shape!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: This seemed to be well made, but the size chart they provided didn't work for me. I have a 30" waist so I followed the instructions and got the next size smaller, but even fully extended, I could not get it closed. I have purchased other steel bound corsets in a size small and they all fit, but this one was way too small.
customer_reviews.author: Kell

customer_reviews.title: A must buy 😍😍😍
customer_reviews.text: I love it I ordered a 4xl because I am 5'9 and 200 + pounds in USA measurements but I should have got a 3xl because I was able to completely close the lacing but aleast I can begin my journey to a smaller waist. Great matieral heavy duty strong lacking I am defiantly ordering again and again
customer_reviews.author: erica

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love this, I'm saving up for the more expensive Alter Ego Clothing corset but in the meantime this corset is getting me used to wearing one. For the price you can't beat it. YouTube corset wearing before purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: This is my first corset and I really like it. It seems very well made
customer_reviews.text: This is my first corset and I really like it. It seems very well made. The bindings are strong and the fabric is very nice. Because I'm a newbie i was worried it would be a challenge to tighten it myself. No problem at all getting it tight. I'd definitely recommend this product to a friend. I should also mention I found it much more comfortable in some respects than a latex waist trainer style corset/girdle. The boning keeps it from rolling or folding. Really a great product at a super price!
customer_reviews.author: E. C. Wright

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought medium because most of the comments recommended to size up. It fits me well. I was scared to hurt myself because I've read that some ladies had broken ribs from corset training so I was cautious. About a month later I had to buy a small, BECAUSE IT WORKED! I guess some people wants instant results that's why they cinch it too tight. I want a slim waist but not enough to injure myself. Sometimes I cinch it too tight and I get light-headed so I just loosen it a little. I love it but the sizing is a little off. I could've probably rate it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: A true corset!
customer_reviews.text: These corsets are made with sturdy, long lasting materials. The fabric, the boning, and the laces are all top notch. The extended modesty panel is nice to have, especially for anyone who tends to buy smaller to get that extra pinch. The laces are thick and strong enough that I am able to tighten my corset up without assistance. I purchased the black and white satin ones and they are both vibrant. I got some pink makeup or dye on the white one and it was easy to hand wash and return to its original glory! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Quality corset, compares to Orchard Corset
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Large and need an XLarge. I will be purchasing another, and keeping this one for when I lose weight. I love this so much, and I just underestimated the sizing. Very sturdy, well made, and just a solid corset. Compares to the quality of Orchard Corset without the high cost. Shipped very prompt and will purchase from them again
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Only one drawback:  garter loops too wide
customer_reviews.text: Love the corset except for one thing. The garter loops are made for a 1" detachable hook. Detachable garters to fit are un-obtainium (my word for you can't buy them). You can make them but even that is difficult as the materials are hard to come by as well. If they would have only used 3/4" ribbon this would get the fifth star. Others have griped about fit. If you use their size chart you should be good. It seem to be extremely accurate for their garment. I know that no one wants to see an 'L' and certainly not an 'X' on their label, so once you are sure it fits, rip the tag off!
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: When it arrived it looked beautifully made and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived it looked beautifully made and very sturdy , however while trying it on for the first time I uncinched the back laces until I could start latching the hooks , as I was trying to do that the corset broke. The bar holding the hooks pulled right through the stitching! I am so disappointed 😔 I have 2 stars because I feel maybe this is a fluke thing , I wasn't pulling hard enough to rip anything , let alone rip out that steel bar and I don't remember reading a similar incident. I could tell that the sizing I ordered would have fit me well once cinched up. I hope I can get this resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product make sure to figure our measurements
customer_reviews.text: I unfortunately ordered too small in this item but I would definitely order from them again! This corset is extremely well made, easy to tie, and all I had to do was had Linder laces and it was great. I will definitely order a larger size it is an amazing buy for sure!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'6 135 lbs. and my waist size is 28". I ordered a S 24" though my waist measures 28" it fits perfectly! I have had 6 kids and hope to get my small waistline back by wearing this at night. I have worn it once at night and slept well! I have worn it during the day as well but prefer to wear it while I sleep. Since I cinch it up very tight it gets a bit uncomfortable to wear during the day. Also I think it will be great for my posture!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the results!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about trying my first waist trainer. Make sure to pay close attention to the sizing. It fix as described. This was my first time wearing a corset, so I did have some difficulty putting it on for the first time. After the first time, it much easier. I was worried about pinching, but the flap in the back separated skin from the strings. I was surprisingly comfortable in the steel boning corset. It forces you to sit straight and does a great job at keeping everything in. It is smooth under your cloths. When you tie it off, the string can show if wearing something tight.
customer_reviews.author: MaryShields

customer_reviews.title: This functions as the most comfortable back brace I've ever worn
customer_reviews.text: This functions as the most comfortable back brace I've ever worn. I'll never be without one. I think the waist training stuff is bunk, but I don't wear it for that OR to "sexy." It goes over a cotton camisole, and under a shirt. I can forget a twinging injury completely even when worn very, very loosely. It's not for overuse that might allow muscles to actually weaken--just for a bit of relief.
customer_reviews.author: tom74

customer_reviews.title: structured and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Makes a very skinny waist. I mustve snagged it on something so thats to be weary of... but I dont blame the fabric on this... it would happen to anything with holes... its breathable unlike most corset so that also a bonus. I would definitely suggest you give this corset a try because I think its well worth it ascetically and structurally. Its a bitch to put on though... like the way it hooks takes me some time to figure out, so that knocked off a star because it takes me a while to put on
customer_reviews.author: Melissa K

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It makes all my “squishy” disappear and gives me a great shape. It appears sturdy. Easy to adjust. I wear it under my regular clothes - usually wear a tank top as undershirt, and you can’t tell I am wearing any kind of support.
customer_reviews.author: Tam D.

customer_reviews.title: I love my corset!!
customer_reviews.text: When I received my corset, it was packaged nicely. To break it is, I was wearing it for 2 hours a night for 2 weeks. It fits me very comfortably, and shapes me well. I originally bought it for not only a bit of shaping, but to help my formerly injured back. I was able to sleep in it comfortably. I would recommend this to anyone. I have a short waist, and I did order what the chart said, but I should have dropped down another size or two. I have maxed out being able to tighten it.
customer_reviews.author: Cedar

customer_reviews.title: Great corset - particularly for short torsos
customer_reviews.text: Long had I suffered in overly long, ill-fitting corsets before discovering this little gem. Especially for the price, you can't beat it! Wonderful for waist-training and super comfortable. Just make sure you don't tie the laces around your waist before lacing. Re-lace the corset with shorter ribbons if you have to, but don't loop it around your waist to tighten because it will compromise the integrity of the busk.
customer_reviews.author: ASK26

customer_reviews.title: Order a size smaller.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 180 pounds and a 35 inch waist. I got the L. I have about a 4 inch gap in the back. The bones are steel. This thing is practically bullet proof. I see this corset lasting for a while. I originally bought an XL and it was too big. The second time I laced up, there was no gap in the back at all. Returned it for a L. Large is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Corset came used!
customer_reviews.text: Mine just arrived nicely packaged, but upon opening it was full of pet hair and appears maybe a tag was ripped off? The lacing has also been tampered with. I’m new to a corset so now I’ll have to look up how to lace one. I’m all for buying used items, but this item was marked as new and that’s what I thought I was buying. I have strong allergic reactions to pets and will now have to figure out how to thoroughly wash and remove all contamination before I can even use it. Uhg just bummed with my purchase and lack of quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Great for Waist Training.
customer_reviews.text: I love these corsets!!! Great for tightlacing! Many discount ones I have bought at Amazon are more girdles in the shape of corsets. This one has all the real build of a tightlacing waist trainer. It is a thick 2 pound corset with steel bones, and a steel busk, belt tape, and strong laces. It can cinch you in 5 or more inches not just the 2 or 3 of the plastic kind. One of the few I have bought online that was worth the money. I have been doing waist training, and the Camellias brand gets REAL results. Also it looks GREAT with dresses for a night out.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea  E Menzies

customer_reviews.title: One size bigger recommend. Super great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This item looks great & is of very good quality only issue is that I’ve should have purchased a size; Large or XL. I’m a medium & looks like it’s not fitting at all so I’m returning it back for a larger size! Great quality, fast shipping just doesn’t fit me well. I recommend to Go one bigger !
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Perez

customer_reviews.title: Good price and quality
customer_reviews.text: I was very careful to read all I could concerning the size. The seller states not to use the Amazon size guide, instead use your natural waist measurement. I am writing this for my wife as I do all the Amazon ordering. She measured at a 35 inch waist so we ordered the XL. She has worn it a week and has it laced within an inch of being all the way. So the Large would have been a better fit. All in all we are happy with the price and the quality. She is not sure if this will reduce her waist along with diet and exercise.
customer_reviews.author: John Crane

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but too short
customer_reviews.text: This is high quality but seems way too short. I'm only 5'4" 198 lbs 40-39-43. Maybe I have a long torso and didn't know it? If I have this directly under bust, it pushes my lower bulge down causing me to feel very self conscious that I have a fat roll hanging down. I can't wear pants/shorts without having a bulge, if worn under bust, or feeling like "Urkel." Maybe I'm wearing it incorrectly? It is my first corset so I'm doing more research on it before I return it. I'm hoping to find a longer corset, hopefully from the same company since it seems like great quality and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Maydenne

customer_reviews.title: After reading the other reviews I ordered a size larger which was perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: These corsets do run small. The first one I ordered, I ordered according to the size chart and it was too small. After reading the other reviews I ordered a size larger which was perfect for me. It is very well made and sturdy. It stayed in place and did not roll up. I have scoliosis so it allowed me to stand without pain at my daughters wedding and it looked very nice as well. I got a lot of compliments. I will definitely be buying this item again in some other colors as I believe this one will last a long time. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Spark

customer_reviews.title: Shocked at the Quality
customer_reviews.text: Quite honestly, if you told me I could get a $40 corset that was this heavy duty, and made this well, I would not have believed you. I am quite frankly impressed with how nice this is. All metal hardware, good boning, and put together well. 20 years ago, I'd have paid 4 times that.
customer_reviews.author: Wolsey

customer_reviews.title: Trust me! It's worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I definitely lost 3-4 inches in 30 days. I wear it to sleep 4 to 5 days a week for 8-10 hours at a time. Highly recommended if you are trying to shape and shrink your waist. But consistency is a must. Working out 2 to 3 times a week also increases the speed of results. The Carissa is also very sturdy and well made so I'm not worried about it breaking or snapping at all
customer_reviews.author: Daphane

customer_reviews.title: Very strong, works exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a great corset. It works exactly as expected. The steel boning is very strong. The cloth is non-irritating. You can really snatch your waist in very tight, depending on how much of the pain you can take . :)
customer_reviews.author: Beth M. Seelbaugh

customer_reviews.title: great product but will need assistance to wear it.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly the sizing I expected when I order it. It’s very hard to put on and take of. Great product if you have help assisting you putting it on and taking it off. Would of love to see one with a zipper instead. Of the metals buttoms.
customer_reviews.author: Maria V Ferreira

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fits well, but not long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this and it has been useful for performing, but it really cannot take a beating. I was excited that it was mesh. (I get very hot when performing), but I worried about delicacy. In actuality the mesh stood up fine. Rather, it's the fabric channels that hold in the boning that are starting to fall apart. I've worn my maybe 5 times and one of them is now splitting already.
customer_reviews.author: Saskia Seattle

customer_reviews.title: awesome corset for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this corset is perfect! Great quality and it is definitely assisting me in achieving a smaller waist. I am 5'5 about 150 and got the XL size. While my natural waist is currently about 34 inches this was a tight fight and the laces had to be loosened quite a bit. I did see some reviews mentioning the short length and will agree that the length is on the shorter side but nonetheless I still love it!
customer_reviews.author: Darla

customer_reviews.title: Great product... worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This is really nicely made for the price. I was actually kind of surprised how well it's made and its functionality. Within a day, it fixed my posture. I looked and felt taller, even my husband noticed the difference on day one. And within the next couple of days, i felt and saw a difference in my body structure and clothes. Definitely worth buying to try out, more than enough for a beginner! definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Pooja Kabotra

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it. Did not try this until recently, and find no way to contact the seller for a return. The item is not as described, this item fits a long torso.
customer_reviews.author: doc

customer_reviews.title: Great construction and quality, make sure it’s for your body type.
customer_reviews.text: I’m gonna start off by saying it’s surprisingly heavy, but very comfortable and feels like very good quality construction and boning. However, if you already have a somewhat hourglass figure I don’t think this is the right corset for you. It does smooth out the curves and makes them look nicer, but I’m not able to cinch my waist anymore so it’s not any smaller with the corset on.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Breatheable mesh!  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my favourite corset yet (the mesh one) because it's very sturdy but BREATHEABLE! I think everyone who wears corsets should own one. Perfect if you're going to a metal show or going dancing, anywhere you want to look cool without dying of heat.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila DeLong

customer_reviews.title: Back support :)
customer_reviews.text: I think so far so good! Really beautiful! I'm not sure if it has effected me as this is day 2. But I've been rather consistent wearing it about 5 hours or maybe more! It's quite comfortable. I feel it has already helped and improved my posture. Helps keep me from slouching or hurting myself when lifting things. I notice only one negative which is obvious for this item, I have some trouble breathing with it on and a while after I take it off. But somehow it is comforting for me when it's on. Yes! I'll write an updated review when I see some results :)
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Order a size up..very compressed.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size small as I have another waist trainer size small that I've broken in, this one however seems to be for tinier girls than me:0 I am 5'6, weigh 143 lbs, waist size 29. I should've ordered a medium. Corsets is beautiful, however I will have to undo the laces quite a bit on the back for it to fit me at all :/ That back flap of black coverage will not cover me once I untie the laces enough for the waist trainer to fit. I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H

customer_reviews.title: Super Short String
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered multiple corsets from this company and have never had this issue. I ordered my correct size double checked and the string was SO short on this corset. I have actually never seen a corset have so little string. I took the string out of my other corset and it had more string than this new one I got. I guess I will sadly be returning it and ordering a size up since the size chart seems to not be right. Quality of the corset seems nice at least.
customer_reviews.author: username

customer_reviews.title: Check out Lucy's Corsetry to learn how to Self Lace
customer_reviews.text: This product is fabulous and durable. I highly recommend that you wear a thin cotton or compression type of tank top underneath. When you tighten the lace, make sure you tie it FROM THE BACK. Do NOT wrap the lace around you, it will damage the corset. Instead,go to Youtube and watch this video: "Self-lacing example (inverted bunny ears) | Lucy's Corsetry"
customer_reviews.author: M.A.

customer_reviews.title: Overall great but buy with caution
customer_reviews.text: Whew lord, let me say this was the most complicated thing to get into... for the few days will will need help and expect to pinch your fingers and break a nail or two. I’m on day 4 and it’s seems to be getting easier. It works and after removing it I can see my little six back coming back! Overall great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tangi Smith

customer_reviews.title: Niiccceee
customer_reviews.text: 2nd Time purchasing this Waist Trainer Corset! It's adjustable and helps with me not eating a lot. I wear it everyday all day intp the midnight hour.....basically until it's time to take a shower and go to bed. The only issue that I had is that the fabric by the last hook will come apart and that's just considering normal wear and tear. I usually just sew it back together after I've pushed the wiring back in place. Would definitely purchase again and again!
customer_reviews.author: COO COO

customer_reviews.title: I can't latch the middle section
customer_reviews.text: I measured my waist, and ordered according to the size chart. I can't figure out how to get it on. I can get the top and bottom latch, but I can't figure out how to put them all on. I would start at the top, when I got the the second one, the top one would pop back off. (Same thing if I started from the bottom). Because I can't latch the middle section, it pokes into my stomach and caused red marks. I tried until my hands were too tired. But it looks like it would be cute. (Just to be clear, it's not a size issue. I think it's a dixtarity issue).
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: First Corset! Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first corset, and it fits perfectly! I had to loosen up the lacing quite a bit before I could hook the busks. I was able to tighten it by myself, but I suggest you watch a few videos on corset lacing. I bought this corset for back support and waist training. Also, I ate dinner while wearing it for the first time. I was not able to eat as much as I usually eat. I might lose a little weight during my training. I will definitely buy again when my waist gets small enough! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: If you have wide hips it might hurt
customer_reviews.text: This left marks on my hips and didnt feel bendy enough to where it was squeezing my ribs enough, may have to do with my wide hips or the corset being too long. Dont expect it to be comfortable. It does the job though.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hettinger

customer_reviews.title: it is comfortable and does a good job in giving me a ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a long-line corset that I can't quite squeeze into yet, so I bought this one to help me in my waist training. Even though the length is a little shorter on me than I expected (I am 5'-9"), it is comfortable and does a good job in giving me a nice silhouette. I am pleased that I purchased it. Great quality and construction. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived quickly and was as described. I ordered according to the size chart but it fit at the tightest so I should have ordered a size smaller. In other words it doesn't necessarily cinch the waist but more or less shapes it. My major problem with this is that it doesn't fully cover the problem belly area. I bought it basically to wear under my dresses for work but the front end kinda raises so definitely makes a bulge. Sigh. Not totally a waste but not for someone who has had a baby and has a little "flab".
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Recommend - sturdy, strong support
customer_reviews.text: It is good quality. Very sturdy and somewhat heavy, but I figured it would be. Really cinches you in. Shoe lace type laces, not ribbon. It is shorter height-wise (hip to bust) than the others I bought. A good inch n 1/2 to 2 inches. If you are short waisted, this is for you. It's hard to tell what size chart to use. I should have gotten a siza larger. (37"waist =xxxL is better. I got xxL.) However, the laces allow me to use it anyway. I am not using it for waist training, but for back support. Bad back. I am finding corsets in general are helping support and keep disks etc in place. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RO

customer_reviews.title: premium quality for budget price
customer_reviews.text: Really well made. I was worried when I ordered this that it was going to be a costume type corset. It's not, it's laced properly too so there is no confusion as to how to lace it. It has nice sturdy clasps and nice double seams. I wish it came in more colors but it's not going to stop me from buying more of this style and brand. Excellent product,money well spent, you won't regret buying one especially if this is your first one or your just starting waist training
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! I love that it has a lace up back to progressively tighten as your waist gets smaller. It has heavy steel boning but is surprisingly comfortable. I wore it yesterday running errands and around the house for probably 12 hours before I was ready to take it off. When I finally did take it off I felt like I just did a major ab workout. Very satisfied, quality and it's beautiful. Win win!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren McCord

customer_reviews.title: Not great for long torso's
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'9'' and bought a Medium size. The quality is great, and it's much easier to tie in the back by yourself than other corsets. The only complaint I have is that it doesn't cover my entire torso, it covers to a bit under my belly button so when I sit down there's a glob of fat that hangs out under the corset and looks incredibly unflattering. For those taller people, I'd recommend this corset if you're focusing on training just your waist and you're home alone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best corset ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this corset! It is probably the best corset I have tried. It is totally worth it and has a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Curves
customer_reviews.text: I bought a second one after about six months when one of the closures broke. I get so many compliments on my excellent posture. I love how I have curves for the first time in my life!!
customer_reviews.author: MommaMeow

product_meta.title: SHAPERX Women's Waist Training Corsets Underbust Heavy Duty 26 Steel Boned Hourglass Silhouette Body Shaper
feature_bullets: ►Heavy Duty: 26 Double Steel Boned Waist Trainer Corset for Waist Training, Cinching and Slimming - 20 Spiral Steel Bones, 4 Rigid Steel Bars Supporting Back, 2 Steel Bars Adjacent to Front Busk. Strong Corset Cord Lacing Back.

►This Conical Shaper Underbust Corsets with 3 Layers of Fabric: Inner Layers of High Quality Cotton, Middle Layer Laminated to Outer Layer for Extra Strength. These designs are breathable and less hot/heavy than their Overbust counterparts Sleek design with ribbon lacing.

►Waist Reduction: This garment shapewear is your best choice for the ultimate hourglass shaper. Solid built for heavy duty waist training and body shaping, waist cinching and back support, Ultimate waist reduction, recommended for tight lacing & regular corset wearers Gives you the appearance of a more toned silhouette.

►Our classic black underbust corset has been a customer favourite for ten years. Offering a dramatic waist reduction of up to five inches (or less if you prefer) this is the perfect waist trainer for serious corset lovers. This can be worn discreetly under any outfit to help you give you a stunning hourglass silhouette, night or day.

►This waist trainer corsets designed to be worn under looser clothing, these corsets may be Overbust patterns, have cord lacing or include hip panels Comfortable & breathable, Suitable for wearing all day.
